title: Pistruiatul DVDrip complete x264
description:
Pistruiatul (1973):

IMDB info..........: User Rating: 8.8/10 (106 votes) http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0121010/
* Video codec........: x264
* Framerate..........: 25 FPS
* Video Bitrate......: ~1500 kbit/s
* Resolution.........: 640 x 480
* AR........ ........: 4/3
* Audio codec........: AC3 2.0 - 256 kbit/s (Romanian)
* Source.............: PAL DVD5 Romanian original DVDs
* Subtitles..........: None, sorry


* The total size of all the episodes is made to fit into a single DVD.
* Don&#039;t worry about the mkv format, all you need is Haali Media Splitter and ffdshow. Be sure to check H264 decoding in ffdshow.
* For slower PCs use CoreAVC codec.
* If you want a all in one solution, I recommend Combined Community Codec Pack http://www.cccp-project.net/
* Inca o data, daca nu va merge, fiti siguri ca ati bifat H264 decoding in ffdshow la instalarea CCCP.
